Omaha.Krug Park (amusement park):
Krug Park (currently known as Gallagher Park) was an amusement park located at 2936 North 52nd Street in the Benson neighborhood of Omaha, Nebraska, USA at the turn of the 20th century. In 1930, Krug Park was the site of the worst roller coaster accident in the nation up to that time.


== History ==
Charles Tietz, an early Omaha German-American pioneer, founded the park in 1895.
